publisher

Class Publisher

  • java.lang.Object
    • publisher.Publisher

  • public class Publisher
extends java.lang.Object
    This publisher keeps track of the messages and topics that the MessageServer manages
    Author:
    camillemalonzo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Publisher(UserPool pool)
      Create a Publisher GUI that publishes all the messages that are posted by the users connected to the server and also shows the users currently connected to the server

      • Publisher

    • Method Detail

      • handlesMessage

        public Topic handlesMessage(java.lang.String s,
                   java.io.PrintWriter out,
                   User u)
        1. parses the message into a Message object 2. handles types of requests: a) POST: adds a message to the Messages and also pushes it to the appropriate topic b) SUBSCRIBE: subscribes user 1 to the topic of user 2 c) GETALLSUB: gets a list of all the subscribers in the Message Server
        Parameters:
        s - String current request
        out - the stream to push a message out
        u - the thread currently "on"
        Returns:
        a Topic that has bee updated. Returned to the User Thread, the User will then
